name: The Derelict Orpheus
description:
-WASD/arrow keys to move.

-Left Mouse Button/Left Control to fire at enemies.

-Space to interact with objects.

-Escape to pause & view your investigation notes.

An eldritch sci-fi whodunnit jam game. Created in 72 hours for Mini Jam #73. Five different resolutions to the mystery!

Theme: Power. Limitation: Five-color palette.

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-73-power

Design, Art, & Code: Alexander Kazazis.

Music by Tony Longworth (via Unity Asset Store).
